SummaryEnglish: Spirits wreak havoc over Marmo and Lodoss. Meanwhile, Neese’s internal battle only worsens until Spark can reach her. But he’s faced with the greatest decision of all—grant Lodoss eternal peace, or save Neese.
SummaryJapanese: 中世の冒険家のグループは、ロードス島の闇の勢力との戦いに参加しなければなりません。
Aliases: Record of Lodoss War: Chronicles of the Heroic Knight

1.SummaryEnglish: This series parodies the events of the Record of Lodoss series with the characters in chibi form.
1.TitleJapanese: ようこそロードス島へ!
1.SummaryJapanese: ロードス島を征服しようと、暗黒の島・マーモの王ベルドの勢力が拡大しつつある頃、青年パーンは聖騎士になる為の修行＝ドラゴン退治の旅に出発した。幾多の困難を乗り越え、仲間のギムらとドラゴンを倒すパーンたち。ところがその帰り道、彼らは神聖王国ヴァリスの王女・フィアンナ姫が灰色の魔女・カーラに誘拐されそうになっているところに遭遇してしまう。カーラは、フィアンナを捕らえてロードスに混乱と戦乱を巻き起こそうと企んでいたのだ。それを知ったパーンたちは、カーラの企みを阻止しようとするも、大ボケをかますばかり。だが、これにすっかり呆れたカーラは退散。パーンたちは、フィアンナ姫を助け出すことに成功する。フィアンナ姫を連れてヴァリスへ凱旋したパーンは、ファーン王から聖騎士の称号をゲット。いよいよロードス島征服へ乗り出したベルドとの戦いに挑むのであった。戦いは壮絶を極め、ファーン王ら数多くの兵士の血が流された。そして長い戦いの結果、ヴァリス軍に荷担したフレイム王国のカシュー王の機転で、ヴァリス軍が勝利を収める。しかし喜びも束の間、大賢者・ウォートに真の敵がカーラであることを教えられたパーンは、カーラからロードスを守ることを固く心に誓うのであった。

2.TitleEnglish: Meshimase Lodoss-tō Senki: Sorette Oishii no? - 01
2.SummaryEnglish: Two Lodoss-obsessed students attempt to recruit party members so they can put on a Lodoss-themed play at their school festival.
2.TitleJapanese: 召しませロードス島戦記 ～それっておいしいの？～ 冒険の1 今日からお前はエトだ！
2.SummaryJapanese: バンとドリは『ロードス島戦記」が大好きすぎる水野中学に通う３年生。ある時、校内で【エト】にそっくりな女の子と出会う。そこで「ロードス島戦記とは……」と熱く語り始めるのだが…

3.TitleEnglish: Meshimase Lodoss-tō Senki: Sorette Oishii no? - 02
3.TitleJapanese: 召しませロードス島戦記 ～それっておいしいの？～ 冒険の2 どっちが主人公？！
3.SummaryJapanese: 何故か『ロードス島戦記を愛する友の会』の会員にされてしまったエト。学園祭で『ロードス島戦記』の舞台をやる事になり、まずは『ロードス島戦記』の事を何も知らないエトにバンとドリはキャラクターを説明し始めるのだが…

4.TitleEnglish: Meshimase Lodoss-tō Senki: Sorette Oishii no? - 03
4.TitleJapanese: 召しませロードス島戦記 ～それっておいしいの？～ 冒険の3 エルフへの道は険しい！
4.SummaryJapanese: ドリが憧れてやまないディードリット！ディードリットは人間ではなくエルフである為ドリは日夜エルフに近づくべく努力しているのだが…

5.TitleEnglish: Meshimase Lodoss-tō Senki: Sorette Oishii no? - 04
5.TitleJapanese: 召しませロードス島戦記 ～それっておいしいの？～ 冒険の4 旅じゃねぇ！冒険だ！！
5.SummaryJapanese: 『ロードス島戦記』の主人公の事は何となく理解したエト。そこでバンはエトにロードス島で起きたパーン達の冒険を熱く語るのだが…

6.TitleEnglish: Meshimase Lodoss-tō Senki: Sorette Oishii no? - 05
6.TitleJapanese: 召しませロードス島戦記 ～それっておいしいの？～ 冒険の5 エルフ語をマスターしよう
6.SummaryJapanese: 今日から学園祭でやる『ロードス島戦記』の劇の練習を開始したバン達。劇の内容を理解する為に本読みから始めるが、“エルフ語”という難問にぶつかり…

7.TitleEnglish: Meshimase Lodoss-tō Senki: Sorette Oishii no? - 06
7.TitleJapanese: 召しませロードス島戦記 ～それっておいしいの？～ 冒険の6 魔法呪文をマスターしよう
7.SummaryJapanese: 魔法呪文をマスターすることにしたバンたち、バンは“炎の精霊　エフリート”を召喚するため呪文を詠唱するのだが…

8.TitleEnglish: Meshimase Lodoss-tō Senki: Sorette Oishii no? - 07

9.TitleEnglish: Meshimase Lodoss-tō Senki: Sorette Oishii no? - 08

10.TitleEnglish: Meshimase Lodoss-tō Senki: Sorette Oishii no? - 09

11.TitleEnglish: Meshimase Lodoss-tō Senki: Sorette Oishii no? - 10

12.TitleEnglish: Meshimase Lodoss-tō Senki: Sorette Oishii no? - 11

13.TitleEnglish: Meshimase Lodoss-tō Senki: Sorette Oishii no? - 12

14.TitleEnglish: Meshimase Lodoss-tō Senki: Sorette Oishii no? - 13

15.TitleEnglish: Legend of Crystania OVA 1 - Cave of the Sealed
15.TitleJapanese: レジェンド・オブ・クリスタニア 第1巻`封印の洞窟`

16.TitleEnglish: Legend of Crystania OVA 2 - Resurrection of the God`s King
16.TitleJapanese: レジェンド・オブ・クリスタニア 第2巻`神王復活`

17.TitleEnglish: Legend of Crystania OVA 3 - A New Beginning
17.TitleJapanese: レジェンド・オブ・クリスタニア 第3巻`新たなるはじまり`

18.TitleEnglish: Legend of Crystania: The Motion Picture
18.SummaryEnglish: Dreams begin to haunt Lady Sheru -- dreams of her past life as Pirotesse. Her love, Ashram, is being tormented at the hands of the soul of Barbas posing as their former king, Beld of Marmo.
18.TitleJapanese: はじまりの冒険者たち レジェンド・オブ・クリスタニア

1.SummaryEnglish: The epic opens using an in medias res [in the middle of the action] technique. The six main heroes are already on a quest, and the action-driven episode introduces the characters and their dilemmas in quick succession. Young Parn yearns to be a true knight. Etoh's a novice priest of Falis. Wizard Slayn and dwarf Ghim are old friends. Deedlit is a beautiful elf, and Woodchuck is a thief. An encounter with a dragon and the Grey Witch Karla set up some initial threads for the tale to follow.
1.TitleJapanese: 伝説への序章（プロローグ）
1.SummaryJapanese: ロードス島、そこは「帰らずの森」「風と炎の砂漠」「暗黒の島マーモ」や怪物のうごめく地下迷宮と恐るべき場所がいくつも存在する島。マーモの暗黒皇帝ベルドは、魔女カーラの力を背景に、ロードス支配を目論む。青年剣士パーン、神官エト、ドワーフの戦士ギム、魔術師スレイン、エルフの精霊使いディードリット、盗賊ウッド・チャックの一行は、ロードスを守ることができるのか！？

2.SummaryEnglish: Ghim begins his quest to find Leylia, the daughter of the priestess Neese. A band of goblins go after a young woman named Liara but she is saved by Parn, a villager and a teenage son of a former knight. But Parn has killed off one of the goblins, who the villagers normally leave alone, and now the goblins want revenge. As Ghim meets up with Slayn the sorcerer, Etoh the cleric helps Parn track down the goblin lair, but they learn soon enough that the goblins are raiding the village!
2.SummaryJapanese: ザクソンの青年剣士パーンは、神官エトとともにゴブリンに戦いを挑んでゆく。ところが、ゴブリンの洞窟にたどり着いた時には、ゴブリンがすでに村を襲い始めていた。魔術師スレイン、ドワーフの老戦士ギム、ハイエルフのディードリットとの出会い……彼らの旅は始まったばかりだ！

3.SummaryEnglish: Beld, the Emperor of Marmo, an island south of Lodoss begins his plan to conquer Lodoss. He leads two subjects, Ashram the Black Knight, and Wagnard the Dark Sorceror. Karla also appears to be in cahoots with them. Parn trains with Ghim on becoming a stronger fighter, but then encounters a group of kobolds that are led by a dark elf. Deedlit tries to fight the elf, and the rest of the party arrive. The kobolds retreat when they see Alanian soldiers. But Parn is surprised when the Alanians capture them. In the cell, they meet Woodchuck for the first time, but then get their name cleared when the Alanian captain, Jebra, returns and acknowledges Etoh. Jebra offers Parn to join his army. But Parn does have much of a chance to accept as Ashram, the dark elf, and the kobolds later storm the fortress.
3.SummaryJapanese: ロードスの南に位置し、怪物がうごめく暗黒の島マーモ。暗黒皇帝ベルドは、若き副官アシュラム、魔道士バグナードを先頭にロードス全土に進軍を開始する。その陰には灰色の魔女カーラの暗躍があった。マーモを止めようとするパーンたち一行は、誤ってマイス砦に捕らえられてしまうが隊長ジェブラの誤解も解け、客分として迎えられる。そこでアシュラム軍と対峙することに……。

4.SummaryEnglish: The party cuts through the Forest of No Return as Ghim reveals his search for Leylia. Karla intercepts the Princess Fianna, who is carrying a message from the kingdom of Valis to Alania. Parn stands up to the Grey Witch; impressed, she gives him the princess. Unfortunately, Ghim recognizes Karla as someone else. Meanwhile, Wagnard hears the calling of Kardis, Goddess of Destruction.
4.SummaryJapanese: ベルド率いるマーモ軍は、近隣諸国を次々と攻略していく。パーンたち一行は、生きて抜けることは不可能と言われる「帰らずの森」を通ることに。そこである人物の幻影を見たギムは、自分の旅の目的が、神官ニースの娘レイリアを探すことだと告げる。魔女カーラに襲われたヴァリス王国の使者、フィアンナ姫を救うべく、パーンたちは敢然と戦いを挑む！

5.SummaryEnglish: King Fahn of Valis celebrates Fianna's safe return and rallies the kingdom by hosting a ball. Parn and Deedlit dress up but Parn is noticeably distracted when he sees King Kashue present. Woodchuck tries to scam some jailers, but things go wrong when Karla gets involved, freeing one of the prisoners and having him attack the king! In the meantime, the Marmo forces from Emperor Beld invade the Valis border.
5.SummaryJapanese: フィアンナ姫を無事ヴァリス城へ送り届けたパーンたち一行は、ファーン王の歓待を受けることに。そのころ、砂漠の王国フレイムの若き傭兵王カシューもヴァリスへと向かっていた。そのカシュー王の前に、突然魔女カーラが現われ、自分と手を組むように誘いかける。カーラの真意は？　そしてヴァリス城の舞踏会は？　さまざまな思いが交差し、ロードスの夜はふけていく……。

6.TitleEnglish: The Sword of the Dark Emperor
6.SummaryEnglish: Parn and the company are on their way back from Wort's, but arrive at a village destroyed by the Marmo forces. Parn rushes ahead along with Deed and Wood to inform Fahn, while the others stay and heal up the survivors. At Valis, Parn is offered the armor of a Valis holy knight and hears a tale from Fahn about what happened to his father before everyone goes out to battle. Meanwhile, among the Marmo forces, Pirotess the great dark elf woman is introduced, and she offers to assist Ashram who had been ordered by Beld to plan a surprise attack on the Valis main force.
6.SummaryJapanese: 30年の昔、魔神を封じ込めたロードスの6人の英雄のひとりであったベルドも、悪の心に染まったのか魔剣を手にロードス征服の進軍を続ける。六英雄のひとりであるファーン王は、決着をつけるべく立ち上がり、出撃前夜、パーンに「不名誉な死を遂げた」と言われる父テシウスの真実を語る。

7.SummaryEnglish: Kashue's forces are getting decimated in battle. Fahn and Parn try to make their way to him. The Marmo surround the Valis forces, and the battle wears down both sides. Parn briefly encounters Ashram and they engage in combat for the first time. But that fight and others are deferred as King Fahn calls out Emperor Beld in a single one-on-one fight to the death. Parn tries to help Fahn but learns of Karla's motivation for the war and the secret key to her power.
7.SummaryJapanese: 暗黒皇帝ベルド率いるマーモ軍はヴァリス王国に進軍し、恐るべき魔物軍団によりヴァリスの砦は次々と陥落していく。ファーン王は決意を胸に聖騎士団を率いて出陣する。大賢者ウォートが恐れる、魔女カーラの陰謀は実を結んでしまうのか！？　激戦の中、パーンは黒騎士アシュラムとあいまみえ、ファーンとベルドは互いの刃を交えた。

8.SummaryEnglish: As Parn, Deedlit, Etoh and Woodchuck make their way to Karla's, they are intercepted by two new characters in the series, Shiris a female fighter and Orson, a male fighter, who mistakes them for Marmo forces. They fight but after Shiris realizes that Etoh is a priest, she tries to have Orson stand down but Orson has gone into a rage of a berserker! Meanwhile, Ghim decides to go after Karla as well, and tries to free Leylia from Karla's influence.
8.TitleJapanese: 戦士の鎮魂歌（レクイエム）
8.SummaryJapanese: ロードス全土を揺るがせたマーモの暗黒皇帝ベルドと、ヴァリスのファーン王の戦いは、双方の死をもって終結を迎えた。後に「英雄戦争」と言われたこの戦いの裏に、魔女カーラの暗躍を知るものは少なかった。カーラが実は、神官ニースの娘レイリアの体を乗っ取ったのであると知ったパーンたち一行は、レイリアを取り戻し、カーラの野望を阻止すべく、カーラの館へと向かった。

9.SummaryEnglish: Ashram struggles to control Beld's Demon Sword. Wagnard suggests that they need the Scepter from Fire Dragon Mountain; he directs Ashram there and sends Pirotess to kidnap Deedlit. King Kashue also starts toward the mountain, as the newly-awakened dragon Shooting Star terrorizes the countryside. Parn and friends, with the help of Shiris and Orson, fend off the attempt on Deedlit and start toward the mountain to warn Kashue of Ashram's impending arrival.
9.SummaryJapanese: 暗黒皇帝ベルドを失ったマーモは、混乱の中にあった。ベルドの副官だった黒衣の騎士アシュラムは、魔道士バグナードから「手にしたものはロードスを征する」という秘宝”支配の王錫”の伝説を聞く。そしてそれは火竜山に住むエンシェント・ドラゴンのシューティングスターが持つという。ロードス島を揺るがす、新たな戦いが始まった。

10.TitleEnglish: Demon Dragon of Fire Dragon Mountain
10.SummaryEnglish: With Shooting Star wreaking havoc on Flaim, Parn and company join Kashue on the defense. Ashram arrives at the volcano of Flaim ready to fight Shooting Star and recover the Scepter of Domination. King Kashue decides to take the Dragon's path to Shooting Star's lair, as his group wields the recently forged three lances of Myrii. This is a climatic episode filled with fire and death as Parn and his friends battle Ashram and Pirotess inside the mountain when Shooting Star makes its return.
10.SummaryJapanese: 火竜山に近づいたカシュー王の軍に、エンシェント・ドラゴンのシューティングスターが襲い掛かる。パーンはクロスボウでドラゴンの羽に傷を負わせるものの、全軍はやむなく撤退する。一方、マーモの黒騎士アシュラムは、ダークエルフのピロテースとともに火口へと潜入した。熱気渦巻く火竜山を舞台に、息詰る戦いが繰り広げられる。

11.SummaryEnglish: With the Scepter of Domination in Wagnards hands, the Marmo forces seem to be gathering in power, this time stronger than ever. King Kashue has Parns group (Deedlit, Shiris, Orson), and Shadam ride off to inform their allies to converge on Marmo. Ashram also survived the battle with Shooting Star as Karla informs him about Wagnard, so he sets off to return to Marmo. On the way to Moss, Parn and Deedlit split off from the others, but they get schooled as Wagnard arrives with his newfound power and intention to capture Deedlit.
11.SummaryJapanese: シューティングスターは、ディードリット、パーン、カシュー王たちの活躍で倒された。火口に落ちたアシュラムは、ウッド・チャックに乗り移ったカーラの手で助けられていた。一方、フレイムに戻ったパーンたち一行に、暗黒の島マーモに不気味な異変が起きているという知らせが。邪神カーディスを復活させ、その力を手中にせんとする魔道士バグナードの野望があきらかになりつつあった。

12.TitleEnglish: Final Battle! Marmo, the Dark Island
12.SummaryEnglish: With Deedlit as a sacrifice, Wagnard begins the ceremony of reviving Kardis, the goddess of destruction. This involves a really long platform descent into the depths of the earth. The armies of Lodoss approach Marmo, with Parn already ahead to storm the castle ruins. As he plunges deeper into the network, his friends stop off to hold back various monsters, and soon Parn is left alone to forge ahead. Outside, Narse and the evil dragons threaten to annihilate Kashue and Jester's forces until Mycen the Golden Dragon gets involved. Meanwhile Ashram makes his way to face Wagnard and have his revenge.
12.SummaryJapanese: カシュー王率いるロードス全軍は、暗黒の島マーモに迫る。一方、魔術師バグナードはディードリットを生贄とし、邪神カーディスを復活させる儀式に入った。空ではエンシェント・ドラゴンの金竜マイセンと、暗黒竜ナースとの激しい戦いが繰り広げられる。暗黒の島マーモを舞台に、さまざまな思いが交差する。果たしてパーンたちはディードリットを救うことができるのか！？

13.SummaryEnglish: While dragons, men, and beasts fight outside, Parn makes his way to the deepest area where the altar holds the dying Deedlit. Wagnard has been filled with Kardis' immense power, and he takes it out on Ashram, striking with dark magic that slams Ashram into walls and to the brink of death. But Ashram is not about to lose, and when Parn arrives at the scene, a battle ensues among the three. Wagnard seems to have the upper hand, but the battle turns to the two heroes with the swords that were once held by Beld and Fahn, with the future of Lodoss hanging on the edge.
13.SummaryJapanese: パーンは邪神カーディスの生贄とされるディードリットを救うため、マーモ島の邪神祭壇を目指して走り続けていた。上空ではドラゴン、そして地上ではカシュー王がモンスター軍団に最後の戦いを挑んでいた。パーン、アシュラム、バグナードの三つ巴の戦い、ロードス島の運命は……！？

1.TitleEnglish: The Free Knight... A New Legend Begins
1.SummaryEnglish: Years after the War of Heroes, Ashram seeks the Scepter of Domination—one of four treasures protected by legendary dragons. Meanwhile, a woman and a berserker start trouble in a village.
1.TitleJapanese: 自由騎士… 新たなる伝説の始まり

2.TitleEnglish: Dragon... The Guardian of the Lost History
2.SummaryEnglish: Leylia recounts the history of an ancient kingdom of sorcery that was destroyed by its greed for power. In search of its lost treasures, Parn’s group heads to Flaim to ask for King Kashue’s help.
2.TitleJapanese: 竜… 失われた歴史の番人

3.SummaryEnglish: The dragon Shooting Star is on a rampage, causing trouble for Kashue’s people. While Parn offers to help, an unlikely fighter is assigned to lead the rest of the group to Blue Dragon Island.
3.TitleJapanese: 王… 求められた英雄

4.TitleEnglish: Pirates... The Ship of Dark Ambitions
4.SummaryEnglish: Ashram has blocked shipping in the port, leaving Orson and his team with no easy way to travel to Blue Dragon Island.
4.TitleJapanese: 海賊… 黒き野望を乗せた船

5.TitleEnglish: Demon Sword... The Power to Crush Souls
5.SummaryEnglish: Boarding a pirate ship, Orson’s crew finds worse enemies than they expected. Meanwhile, an injured Shooting Star vows to slaughter humans by the hundreds.
5.TitleJapanese: 魔剣… 闇を打ち砕く力

6.SummaryEnglish: Ashram’s group attacks the dragon whose roar is so great that it affects the anger possessing Orson’s heart. As they return to the mainland, a certain bard causes a bit of mischief.

7.SummaryEnglish: Ashram and Kashue race for Shooting Star’s treasure while their teams go head to head outside the mountain. When his companion is in danger, Orson is faced with a crucial decision.
7.TitleJapanese: 死… 伝えられた優しき心

8.TitleEnglish: The Scepter of Domination... The Dream of a United Lodoss
8.SummaryEnglish: Kashue makes a surprising deal with Ashram, and the fight with Shooting Star begins! Who will take the scepter?
8.TitleJapanese: 支配の王錫… ロードス統一の夢

9.SummaryEnglish: A decade after the fight for the scepter, young Spark hopes to join King Kashue’s forces as a knight. But Kashue has bigger worries—the duke of Alania has just allied with Marmo.
9.TitleJapanese: 若き騎士… 試される力

10.SummaryEnglish: After the dark elves escape with the crystal ball, it seems an enemy seeks doom for Lodoss. Kashue hires several brave fighters to stop the thieves and sends them on their way with a new captain.
10.TitleJapanese: 奪回… 与えられた任務

11.TitleEnglish: Light... A Girl Guided by the Gods
11.SummaryEnglish: Spark leads the way on the search for the dark elves when his group comes across a couple of mercenaries. When a healing spell goes awry, their teamwork is put to the test!
11.TitleJapanese: 光… 神に導かれた少女

12.TitleEnglish: Sallying Forth... Pursuing a Dark Shadow
12.SummaryEnglish: As war spreads throughout Lodoss, Spark’s group stops in a castle town. After members of the team have an important discussion, the group hears word of the dark elves and sets out once more.
12.TitleJapanese: 出陣… 黒い影を追って

13.SummaryEnglish: The group finally catches up with the dark elves, but only danger and disappointment await. Their mercenary’s true past is revealed, and just when things finally seem to calm down, an enemy invades Neese’s dreams.
13.TitleJapanese: 悪夢… 忍び寄る暗黒の力

14.SummaryEnglish: Spark and his team learn about Neese’s dismal fate before setting out to Valis in hopes of finding the crystal ball. Meanwhile, Parn’s group learns that the governor of Kanon will be replaced.
14.TitleJapanese: 扉… 告げられた真実

15.TitleEnglish: An Old Enemy... Reunion with the Black Knight
15.SummaryEnglish: The governor of Kanon makes one final raid against the free army, using his villagers as shields. But when Parn and company try to save the hostages, they find that they’re too late—a former foe has returned.
15.TitleJapanese: 宿敵… 黒騎士との再会

16.TitleEnglish: The Holy City... Pursuing a Clue
16.SummaryEnglish: Spark’s group finally arrives in Valis only to be ordered back to Flaim. But a last-ditch effort to find the crystal ball has them running from their own allies!
16.TitleJapanese: 聖なる都… 手がかりを求めて

17.SummaryEnglish: While other heroes wage battles throughout Lodoss, Spark weighs an important decision that puts everyone at risk. Neese gives him a word of advice, but it may not be enough to help.
17.TitleJapanese: 決断… 迫られた選択

18.SummaryEnglish: After a deadly confrontation at the temple, Marmo’s next target is Neese. But saving her from another nightmare is going to take a group effort from Spark and his companions.

19.TitleEnglish: Reunion... In a Distant War-Torn Land
19.SummaryEnglish: Spark tries to keep Neese out of harm’s way as the group travels through dangerous lands to Marmo. At the same time, Neese wants to prove her strength and helps him fight a deadly menace.
19.TitleJapanese: 再会… 遠き戦乱の異国で

20.SummaryEnglish: Having met up with the free army, Spark and Parn share updates on the war. They raid enemy supply lines and return to base for a celebration, where a certain someone lights a spark in Neese’s heart.
20.TitleJapanese: 来襲… 奪われた最後の希望

21.TitleEnglish: A Vow... A Step Towards the Future
21.SummaryEnglish: Wagnard reveals his true intent for resurrecting Kardis. Meanwhile, Spark—distraught by the kidnapping of Neese—is assigned an important mission to take the center of a city under Marmo rule.
21.TitleJapanese: 誓い… 未来へ進む一歩

22.SummaryEnglish: Spark’s group and the free army fight to take the city from Ashram’s control. But Ashram sees a better path for his people than defending their home to the death. After Kashue unites all of Lodoss, Spark heads to Marmo to rescue Neese.

23.SummaryEnglish: As soon as Parn, Spark, and their friends land in Marmo, they find themselves separated by Karla’s trap. While the forces of Lodoss set out to give their support, the dragon Narse awakens in Marmo.
23.TitleJapanese: 上陸… 恐るべき暗黒の島

24.TitleEnglish: The Witch... The One Who Maintains the Balance of Power
24.SummaryEnglish: Just when Narse corners the heroes, an old friend swoops in to fight the rampaging dragon. Then, the group must make a grave decision when Karla offers to stop the resurrection of Kardis at the cost of their lives.
24.TitleJapanese: 魔女… 力の均衛を保つ者

25.SummaryEnglish: Pressing onward, the group splits when they run into Ashram. Parn and his friends stay behind for one final battle with their long-time adversary, while Spark finally arrives at the site of the sacrificial ceremony.
25.TitleJapanese: 決着… 黒騎士の選択

26.SummaryEnglish: With one last step to complete the resurrection, Wagnard and Karla cast deadly spells to block interference. The heroes must remove Karla’s circlet or sacrifice a decoy in order to stop the final spell.
26.TitleJapanese: 破滅… 解き放された邪神

27.TitleEnglish: Hero... The Birth of a New Knight
27.SummaryEnglish: Spirits wreak havoc over Marmo and Lodoss. Meanwhile, Neese’s internal battle only worsens until Spark can reach her. But he’s faced with the greatest decision of all—grant Lodoss eternal peace, or save Neese.
27.TitleJapanese: 英雄… 新たなる騎士の誕生
